title: Save Twisted Treeline

replies.body:
They wont listen, they dont care about people playing it at all. I wish I was wrong. Remember Dominion, people begged, nothing changed their mind. 
I love 3v3 I enjoy only that mode. So when TT is gone, so am I.

>  Remember Dominion, people begged, nothing changed their mind.

If only people actually **played** the mode as much as they talked about it...

Blame Riot for never updating the map and rarely ever touching it balance-wise. The Dominion community used to hold tournaments and everything. Back in the day, there were even a few games with competitive SR players pitted against top Dominion players. The removal of the forums and "Maps % Modes" just really killed any kind of constructive discussion anyone could have about alternative game modes to Summoner's Rift. 

Riot went out of their way to make sure no one would be interested in Dominion before they removed it. 3v3's treatment hasn't been much different, from little things like not including missions, champion mastery and so forth, to near complete neglect in terms of upkeep.

> [{quoted}](name=Padoµch,realm=EUNE,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=MQriNVEw,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2019-09-03T09:58:02.398+0000)
>
> They wont listen, they dont care about people playing it at all. I wish I was wrong. Remember Dominion, people begged, nothing changed their mind. 
> I love 3v3 I enjoy only that mode. So when TT is gone, so am I.

Oh man I remember those dominion days I swear me and my friends used to sit the whole day and play dominion

Still hard to believe that a game that isn't even league is replacing it. I loved 3s because you could actually play the game without blowing up in 1 second.

I honestly bet some guy with influence at riot got stomped by a poppy and was like "YEP WE ARE REMOVING IT". haha.

I did see an influx of rioters playing it right before they announced it's end.
It only has a 2.5% play rate - and that's in NA, the region where it's played the most.

> [{quoted}](name=KFCeytron,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=MQriNVEw,comment-id=0009,timestamp=2019-09-03T17:23:31.321+0000)
>
> It only has a 2.5% play rate - and that's in NA, the region where it's played the most.

2.5% is honestly pretty fine for a mode that has been abandoned years ago

More like left to rot in an alley after being butchered with dirty knife.

There are so many champions that were made for SR that are just not meant to be played on 3v3 and Riot doing once a year patch to 3v3 feels like a chore for them.

> [{quoted}](name=HubbaBubba Ramus,realm=EUW,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=MQriNVEw,comment-id=00090002,timestamp=2019-09-04T05:48:34.616+0000)
>
> I would like to know an actual number of players by converting these 2.5%. 2.5% (since you say it just NA) sounds like a very low procentage, but I am sure the number of players is still high enough to keep the gamemode. I would also like to know, how many people play this gamemode in every region, not just NA. 
> 
> I have to admit, I don't play it on a daily basis, but when I do, I enjoy it.. even if its a 3v3 against AI.

It's still a much lower number of players than the 97.5% who don't play it. The number of players actually isn't high enough to keep the game mode; that's why Riot isn't keeping it. It's around 1% in Brazil and virtually nothing in Korea.

https://dotesports-media.nyc3.cdn.digitaloceanspaces.com/wp-content/uploads/2018/10/11095139/gamemodestats.jpg

> [{quoted}](name=KFCeytron,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=MQriNVEw,comment-id=0009,timestamp=2019-09-03T17:23:31.321+0000)
>
> It only has a 2.5% play rate - and that's in NA, the region where it's played the most.

That's A LOT OF PEOPLE. More than many other games with their own dedicated servers.

I also never post here but I figure why not for the game mode that I love. I basically ONLY play 3s so it would be nice if they kept it.

Doubt they will but doesn't hurt to try...

SAVE TWISTED TREELINE!
{{item:3104}}  {{item:3170}}  {{item:3348}}

Pls upvote
{{sticker:cass-cry}}
Yes! I love playing it although I have to do custom bots mode because mostly new folks play it. At least use it as ahalloween event mode.
It's bot city in Twisted Treeline. 2.5% of NA, but really 1% of the 2.5% are actual players {{sticker:slayer-jinx-unamused}}

10/10 SAVE TWISTED TREELINE! I'm playing it right now, 4 win streak! Lmao. I've loved it forever and I've played since.. Season 2-3 area. Before Vile, before altars, everything. I've loved Twisted Treeline forever, the map itself.. The darkness, it's a beautiful place. I love you isles of majestic-ness. Gotta keep it!{{sticker:slayer-pantheon-thumbs}} {{sticker:zombie-nunu-hearts}}
keep Twisted Treelines i play it so much and is alot of FUN !

RIP 
i play tt since end of season 2 and remember when elise launched with reworked tt 

the most unfun about tt is gold funneling comps 

but the map is fine

Riot is honestly so *insert something bad cuz i get banned for anything bad*. They want to remove TT cuz nobody plays it, but nobody is playing it cuz it hasn't been updated in like 5 years. If they invest the amount of time they are doing rn for tft, then they wouldn't be removing it
I'd really like it to stay in customs. Played a friendly 3v3 the other day and it was fun AF. Map still looks gorgeous.

It is how it is. Riot won't listen and won't change their minds. They would rather like to loose around 5% of all league players than fixing that gamemode. But hey let's see the positive site of things: There are none for us, but Riot doesn't have to worry about that map anymore and they can focus on TFT...

Well my favorite mode is 3v3 and I really don't want to go back to SR. Queues are never longer than 1 minute on EUW and plenty of people play it. LoL needs more game mode diversity right now, we have less choices than we did back in seasons 2-5.
Honestly yes!
no dont save it just remove it already lol

> [{quoted}](name=LRayymond,realm=EUW,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=MQriNVEw,comment-id=0003,timestamp=2019-09-03T14:40:23.457+0000)
>
> no dont save it just remove it already lol

Yeah man! If they can't bring back Hexakill, and URF, then get rid of that map!
